description: This table houses information regarding the decision trees that are currently not fully completed by the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_TMP_DTREE_ID
columns.description: Stores decision trees that haven't been completed by the patient yet.

columns.name: PAT_TMP_DTREE_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: PAT_TMP_DTREE_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: Stores the answer record for the corresponding in-progress decision tree.

columns.name: PAT_TMP_DTREE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the corresponding in-progress decision tree.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In-Progress


Actionable
